citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:35 pm on 28 July
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking with the licensee's wife upon arrival at the facility who
stated the licensee would not be able to return home from work until later in the afternoon. The licensee's wife was unable
to facilitate an inspection with APHIS Officials. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:35 pm on 28 July 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking with the licensee's wife upon arrival at the facility who 
stated the licensee would not be able to return home from work until later in the afternoon. The licensee's wife was unable 
to facilitate an inspection with APHIS Officials. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection 
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
